content:
# I have successfully extracted another stone brick, bringing my total to 9 stone bricks in my inventory. 
# The furnace is currently in a "NO_INGREDIENTS" state and has only 1 stone left to process.

# Since I have 5 stones in my inventory, I will insert the remaining stone back into the furnace to allow it to continue smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert the remaining 5 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Inserted stone for further smelting. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting stone. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities again.
